messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis, with the assistance of Chauffer Rodney Robinson, rolled the decedent over and placed her in a body bag. Technician Muhammad photographed and collected the spent cas1ng, identified as a 'Win' 9mm Luger. Sergeant McMullen advised Detective Morton on a blood trail. At 2:30AM, Technician Rogers conducted a gunshot residue test. Detective Trehan's documents classified the shooting deaths as Homicides. Detective Morton met with witness Commodore about her encounter with Payne. Detective Aucoin located a set of keys. Detective Morton reviewed the Fifth District Incident Report. Detective Aucoin directed the Crime Lab's processing of the crime scene. Units were manned by Detective Sergeant Robert, Officer Lopez, Officers Burras & Broaden, Officers Addison & Hewitt, Detective Johnson, Detective McGee, Detective Mitchell, Detective McCullum, and the scene on Mazant Street was handled by Detective Pratt. Detective Mathews compiled photographic line-ups. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Sallienger sketched the broken piece of doorjamb. Detectives Morton and Mathews interviewed witnesses. Detective Morton received and reviewed various reports and interviewed Commodore regarding the identification of a perpetrator.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted by Chauffer Rodney Robinson, rolled the decedent over and placed her in a body bag.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Photographed and collected a spent casing identified as a 'Win' 9mm Luger.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Advised Detective Morton on a blood trail.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Technician RogersOfficer Context: Conducted a gunshot residue test at 2:30 AM.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective TrehanOfficer Context: Documents authored by him classified shooting deaths as Homicides.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Met with witness Commodore about her encounter with Payne, reviewed the Fifth District Incident Report, and received various reports.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Located a set of keys and directed the Crime Lab's processing of the crime scene.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant RobertOfficer Context: Unit was manned by him.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer LopezOfficer Context: Unit manned by him.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Burras & BroadenOfficer Context: Unit manned by them.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Addison & HewittOfficer Context: Unit manned by them.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Detective JohnsonOfficer Context: Unit manned by him.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective McGeeOfficer Context: Unit manned by him.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MitchellOfficer Context: Unit manned by him.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective McCullumOfficer Context: Unit manned by him.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective PrattOfficer Context: Handled the scene on Mazant Street.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MathewsOfficer Context: Compiled photographic line-ups and interviewed witnesses along with Detective Morton.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Officer SalliengerOfficer Context: Sketched the broken piece of doorjamb for the crime scene.Officer Role: Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer
